$description: Core animation easing primitives defining motion curves.

linear.$description: Linear easing - constant speed, no acceleration.

ease-in.$description: Ease in - starts slow, accelerates. Use for exits.

ease-out.$description: Ease out - starts fast, decelerates. RECOMMENDED for most UI.

ease-in-out.$description: Ease in and out - slow start, fast middle, slow end.

emphasized.$description: Emphasized deceleration - quick start, strong deceleration.
